kittens.short_desc: A gentle, affectionate kitten with radiant skin and soft wrinkles.
Playful boy with confident personality, great with families.

adoption_flow.title: Submit Application
adoption_flow.copy: Tell us about yourself and your home to ensure a good match.

adoption_flow.title: Breeder Review
adoption_flow.copy: We review every application carefully to protect our kittens' welfare.

adoption_flow.title: Secure with Deposit
adoption_flow.copy: Once approved, send $1000 deposit via Zelle or PayPal F&F.

adoption_flow.title: Sign Agreement
adoption_flow.copy: Sign your adoption contract and receive digital documents.

adoption_flow.title: Pick Up or Delivery
adoption_flow.copy: Schedule your pickup or hand-delivery in LA area. No cargo shipping for Sphynx.
